["DescriptionExclusively listed with Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties. A Type C1 with a swimming pool within the prestigious development of Victory Heights.
FEATURES:
- Type C1
- 5 Bedrooms plus maid's room
- BUA; 4,334 sqft
- Backing onto paths and walkways
- Private swimming pool
- Shared gym
- Shared tennis / basketball courts
- Gated Community 24-hour security & maintenance
- Covered parking
- Nearby town centre includes convenience stores, restaurants, a mosque
- A fabulous school and nursery located next to community
The ground floor briefly comprises; entrance hall with bathroom, downstairs guest bedroom with en-suite, dining room, spacious lounge with sliding doors to the rear garden, kitchen, laundry room and a maids room with internal & external access.
To the first floor there are four double bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes an ensuite bathroom to the master and second bedroom and also a separate family bathroom. 
Externally there is a double garage to the front and a good sized garden to the rear. There is a gate that leads out to the paths and walkways surrounding the community.
Victory Heights is a popular gated community built around the Ernie Els-designed golf course.
The community is largely made up of lots of green open space with parks in most of the villages for the resident to enjoy. There are 4 entrances and exits that lead to the three major road networks of Al Khail, Hessa street and Sheik Mohammed Bin Zayed Road so access in and out of the community is easy.
Call our Victory Heights Specialist on +971504127168 to find out more."]

The Lofts are located on the boulevard, with a plethora of restaurants at your doorstep. As well as walking distance from the metro station and a 5 minutes walk to Dubai mall.']
